errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

auth.loginError: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
auth.sessionExpiredDescription: You have been logged out due to inactivity.
auth.sessionExtendedDescription: Your session has been extended successfully.

sessionTimeout.title: Session About to Expire
sessionTimeout.description: Your session will expire due to inactivity. Click 'Stay Logged In' to continue your session.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: Check your email for the password reset link
forgotPassword.checkEmailDescription: We've sent a password reset link to {{email}}
forgotPassword.didntReceive: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder.
forgotPassword.error: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been reset. You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.error: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
resetPassword.invalidTokenDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
mfa.enterCodeHelp: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
mfa.setupDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
mfa.setupInstructions: Follow these steps to enable two-factor authentication:
mfa.step1: Download an authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
mfa.step2: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app
mfa.manualEntryHelp: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this secret key manually in your authenticator app
mfa.enabledDescription: Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled
mfa.backupCodesDescription: Save these backup codes in a safe place. Each code can be used once if you lose access to your authenticator device.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

messages.appointment_scheduled: The appointment has been scheduled successfully

messages.cancelSuccessDescription: The appointment has been cancelled successfully

visits.recent_visits_description: Click on a visit to view details
visits.error_loading: Failed to load visits. Please try again.
visits.select_patient_description: Search and select a patient to create a new visit
visits.visit_locked_warning: This visit is locked and cannot be edited
visits.visit_signed_warning: This visit is signed and cannot be edited
visits.chief_complaint_placeholder: Brief description of the main reason for this visit...

draft.title: Recover Draft
draft.description: We found an unsaved draft from your previous session. Would you like to recover it?
draft.recovered_description: Your draft from {{minutes}} minutes ago has been restored

templates.title: Visit Templates
templates.description: Manage reusable visit note templates for quick documentation
templates.select_description: Choose a template to pre-fill this visit with standard content
templates.no_templates_description: Create reusable templates to speed up visit documentation
templates.create_template_description: Create a new reusable visit template
templates.edit_template_description: Update the template details and content
templates.delete_template_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the template '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
templates.apply_template_confirmation: You have unsaved changes in this visit. Applying a template will replace all SOAP notes. Do you want to continue?
templates.template_applied_description: Template '{{name}}' has been applied to this visit
templates.template_apply_error: Failed to apply template. Please try again.
templates.name: Template Name
templates.name_placeholder: e.g., Annual Physical Exam, Diabetes Follow-up
templates.name_description: A descriptive name to identify this template
templates.description_placeholder: Optional description of when to use this template
templates.description_description: Explain when this template should be used
templates.specialty_description: Medical specialty this template is designed for
templates.default_visit_type_description: Automatically select this visit type when applying the template
templates.soap_sections_description: Define template content for each SOAP section
templates.subjective_placeholder: Template for subjective notes (patient complaints, history)...
templates.objective_placeholder: Template for objective findings (vital signs, exam findings)...
templates.no_soap_content: No SOAP content defined for this template
templates.create_success_description: Visit template has been created successfully
templates.update_success_description: Visit template has been updated successfully
templates.delete_success_description: Visit template has been deleted successfully

visits.no_visits_description: This patient has no visit records yet. Create the first visit to get started.

signature.title: Sign Visit
signature.description: Sign this visit to make it official and prevent further editing.
signature.warning: This action cannot be undone. Make sure all information is correct before signing.
signature.effects: After signing, the following will happen
signature.effect_1: Visit status will change to SIGNED
signature.effect_2: Visit content can no longer be edited
signature.effect_3: A digital signature hash will be generated

lock.title: Lock Visit
lock.description: Permanently lock this signed visit to prevent any modifications.
lock.warning: This is a permanent action that cannot be reversed!
lock.effects: After locking, the following will happen
lock.effect_1: Visit status will change to LOCKED
lock.effect_3: Visit cannot be unlocked or modified
lock.note_description: Locking is typically done for legal or regulatory compliance. Only lock visits that are final and complete.

errors.patient_required_description: A patient ID is required to create a visit. Please select a patient first.

vitals.title: Vital Signs
vitals.bmi_description: Automatically calculated from weight and height

validation.bp_systolic_min: Systolic BP must be at least 70 mmHg
validation.bp_systolic_max: Systolic BP must be at most 250 mmHg
validation.bp_diastolic_min: Diastolic BP must be at least 40 mmHg
validation.bp_diastolic_max: Diastolic BP must be at most 150 mmHg
validation.heart_rate_min: Heart rate must be at least 30 bpm
validation.heart_rate_max: Heart rate must be at most 250 bpm
validation.respiratory_rate_min: Respiratory rate must be at least 8 breaths/min
validation.respiratory_rate_max: Respiratory rate must be at most 60 breaths/min
validation.weight_min: Weight must be at least 0.5 kg
validation.weight_max: Weight must be at most 500 kg
validation.height_min: Height must be at least 20 cm
validation.height_max: Height must be at most 300 cm
validation.oxygen_min: Oxygen saturation must be at least 70%
validation.oxygen_max: Oxygen saturation must be at most 100%

objective.description: What you observe (physical exam, test results, vital signs)

validation.subjective_max: Subjective notes must not exceed 5000 characters
validation.objective_max: Objective notes must not exceed 5000 characters

prescription.instructions_description: Instructions that will be shown to the patient
prescription.type_to_search: Type at least 2 characters to search

quickText.title: Quick Text Templates
quickText.description: Select a template to insert commonly used clinical phrases

dosageCalculator.title: Dosage Calculator
dosageCalculator.description: Calculate medication dosages based on patient parameters
dosageCalculator.warning: This calculator provides estimates only. Always verify dosages against current prescribing guidelines and patient-specific factors.

descriptions.weightBased: Calculate dose based on patient weight (mg/kg)
descriptions.bsaBased: Calculate dose based on body surface area (mg/m²)
descriptions.creatinineClearance: Estimate creatinine clearance using Cockcroft-Gault formula

errors.invalidInput: Please enter valid numbers for all required fields
errors.missingAge: Patient age is required for creatinine clearance calculation

previousVisit.title: Previous Visit History
previousVisit.description: Review recent visits for context while documenting
previousVisit.noVisits: No previous visits found for this patient

versions.title: Version History
versions.no_versions_description: This visit has not been modified since creation
versions.restore_confirmation: Are you sure you want to restore version {{version}}? This will replace the current draft with this version.

templates.description: Manage reusable prescription templates for commonly prescribed medications
